(v) 
- Exist or occur at a date earlier than (something):
eg: here parish boundaries seem clearly to predate Roman roads

(v) extend over, last, stretch across
- Extend across (a period of time or a range of subjects):
eg: their interests span almost all the conventional disciplines
Punctual, not late; đúng giờ đã hẹn

archaeologist: In time (for something / to do something)
(n) nhà khảo cổ:
(vừa kịp lúc (sớm một chút) để làm gì.
Ex: - Will you be home in time for dinner? Biểu tượng cảm xúc smile soon enough for dinner).
(Bạn sẽ về nhà kịp bữa tối chứ?)

- to be unaware of what time it is
eg: I bought my husband a watch, because he was always losing track of time. Now he is never late.

(adv) theo niên đại, theo thứ tự thời gian
eg: the essays are arranged chronologically

(adv) previously, earlier; trước đây
 In the past; in earlier times
